channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: BP shares fall to lowest since 2022 after sharp drop in the oil major's third-quarter profit
item.description: British oil major BP on Tuesday reported its weakest quarterly earnings in nearly four years, weighed down by a slump in crude prices.

item.title: Pfizer tops earnings estimates, hikes full-year guidance as Covid products help sales
item.description: It is a critical quarterly report for Pfizer, which is grappling with activist pressure from Starboard Value.

item.title: McDonald's executives say E. coli outbreak is 'behind us'
item.description: The outbreak isn't expected to have a material impact on McDonald's business, CFO Ian Borden said.

item.title: Lucid has high expectations for new Gravity SUV as customer orders set to open
item.description: The Gravity is Lucid's second vehicle following the Air sedan, which the luxury EV manufacturer has been selling in small numbers since late 2021.

item.title: Trump Media shares halted for volatility as DJT rally accelerates
item.description: Trading of Trump Media shares was temporarily halted for volatility as the company majority-owned by Donald Trump surged at the opening bell.

item.title: Job openings in the U.S. fall to the lowest level in 3 1/2 years
item.description: U.S. job openings fell in September to a three-and-a-half year low as as the demand for labor ebbed and businesses waited for the economy to speed up.

item.title: European markets turn negative; HSBC shares tick up 4.5% as earnings beat expectations
item.description: European markets turned negative Tuesday afternoon, as traders in the region continued to digest the latest slew of earnings reports.

item.title: Stocks are little changed as Wall Street awaits Big Tech earnings: Live updates
item.description: Stocks were flat Tuesday as investors readied for key corporate earnings releases, including reports from notable tech names.

item.title: McDonald's reverses U.S. same-store sales declines in the third quarter, but E. coli fallout looms
item.description: Shares of McDonald's have fallen 6% since its Quarter Pounder burgers were linked to a deadly E. coli outbreak.
